member.summary: Re-exports Remoting.IRpcHandlerFactory.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.OptionalFieldAttribute
member.summary: Adds automatic inlines to a property so that a missing JavaScript field is converted to None, otherwise Some fieldValue.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.StubAttribute
member.summary: Marks members that should be compiled by-name.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.RpcAttribute
member.summary: Marks a server-side function to be invokable remotely from the client-side.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.RequireAttribute
member.summary: Annotates members with dependencies. The type passed to the constructor must implement Resources.IResourceDefinition and a default constructor.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.RemotingProviderAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the client-side remoting provider that should be used by remote function calls in this assembly. The type passed to the constructor must have three static methods as described by the interface Remoting.IRemotingProvider.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.RemoteAttribute
member.summary: Marks a server-side function to be invokable remotely from the client-side.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.ProxyAttribute
member.summary: Declares a type to be a proxy for another type, identified directly or by using an assembly-qualified name.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.NameAttribute
member.summary: Provides a runtime name for members when it differs from the F# name. The constructor accepts either an explicit array of parts, or a single string, in which case it is assumed to be dot-separated.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.MacroAttribute
member.summary: Annotates methods with custom compilation rules. The supplied type should implement Macros.IMacroDefinition and a default constructor.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.JavaScriptAttribute
member.summary: Marks methods, properties and constructors for compilation to JavaScript.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.InlineAttribute
member.summary: Marks methods and constructors for inline compilation to JavaScript. Inline members work by expanding JavaScript code templates with placeholders of the form such as $0, $x, $this or $value directly at the place of invocation. See also DirectAttribute.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.DirectAttribute
member.summary: Marks methods and constructors for direct compilation to a JavaScript function. Direct members work by expanding JavaScript code templates with placeholders of the form such as $0, $x, $this or $value into the body of a JavaScript function. See also InlineAttribute.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Pervasives.ConstantAttribute
member.summary: Marks union cases or properties that should be compiled to constants.

member.summary: Re-exports Remoting.SetHandlerFactory.

member.summary: Defines operators and functions that are automatically available whenever `IntelliFactory.WebSharper` is open.

member.summary: This interface only exists for documentation purposes. A remoting provider must implement its members as *static* members. (see AjaxRemotingProvider)

member.summary: The IAjaxProvider used by the library. Defaults to an XMLHttpRequest implementation. Can be reset.

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Remoting.UseHttps
member.summary: Set the Endpoint to use HTTPS even if the current page was server via HTTP. Return true if the endpoint needed to be changed, false if the current page is already HTTPS.

member.name: P:IntelliFactory.WebSharper.Remoting.EndPoint
member.summary: The URL to the remoting endpoint. Defaults to the current URL: the server that serves the application usually also handles remoting requests. In mobile scenarios this property is set to the deployed address of the server application.
